example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS عادت) (NP-SBJ-1 (PUNC ") (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM دودة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الصندل)) (PUNC ")) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تفتك) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC مجددا)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاشجار) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الحرجية)) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN منطقة) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP الشوف)))))

arg.g: the forest trees in the Shouf area
